p: A. aegypti was reintroduced in the Cear√° cities of Aquiraz, Beberibe and Fortaleza in the mid-1980s 10. The first dengue cases occurred in August 1986, originating from tourists from RJ, where a dengue epidemic (DENV-1) was occurring, who were visiting the cities of Fortaleza and Canoa Quebrada 11.
